description:
A normal highschool student at first glance but actually posseses another identity as Yumeno Sakiko (夢野咲子), creator of shoujo manga Let`s Love~ (恋しよっ Koishiyo~) in magazine Monthly Shoujo Romance (月刊少女ロマンス). Despite making a romance-oriented manga, he has absolutely no experience in love. His ideas for storyline is often delusional and ridiculous. Asks Sakura, who is a member of art club, to be his assistant. During middle school, he was a captain of the school basketball team. He is now in class 2-B.
Source: Wiki
name: Nozaki Umetarou
